channel.title: Optics on Akol
channel.description: Recent content in Optics on Akol

item.title: Qrcode
item.description: If you are here it means that you scanned one of the QRCodes that are in the items of the Akol Scope Mod. If you’ve been redirected here from a server that is not using the Akol Scope Mod, it means that you are playing a server using a ripped version of the original mod. Please report it here. The mod is developed and distributed for free in the Steam Workshop under the steam account Akol.
